com.ftpos.library.smartpos.emv

Interface IKernelINSInfo


  • public interface IKernelINSInfo
    Kernel Instruction.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CLOSE_RF
      For the onSendOut callback method, the Kernel requires the App to close the contactless card reader.
      static int DISPLAY
      For the onSendOut callback method, the Kernel requires the App to display a prompt message to the cardholder.
      static int DOL
      For the onObtainData callback method, the Kernel passes a DOL to the App.
      static int LANGUAGE_ID
      For the onSendOut callback method, the Kernel informs the App that it needs to use the specified language.
      static int LANGUAGE_SELECT
      For the onSendOut callback method, the Kernel informs the App that it needs to let the cardholder choose a language.
      static int PAN
      For the onObtainData callback method, the Kernel passes a DOL to the App.
      static int TAG_LIST
      For the onObtainData callback method, the Kernel passes a list of Tags to the App.
      static int TLV_DATA
      For the onSendOut/onObtainData callback methods, the Kernel passes a set of TLV data to the App, currently used in the DE function in PayPass transaction.

    • Field Detail

      • DISPLAY

        static final int DISPLAY
        For the onSendOut callback method, the Kernel requires the App to display a prompt message to the cardholder.
